message.content: {"id": "10022", "title": "Bug 10022: Incorrect \"Build\" popup action enablement", "description": "Bug 10022: The \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if there is no need for a manual build.", "OB": "The \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled when there is no need for a manual build.", "EB": "The \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there is a need for a manual build.", "SR": "The enablement of the \"Build\" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should depend on whether there is a need for a manual build."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '10022', 'title': 'Bug 10022Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement', 'description': 'Bug 10022Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'No need for a manual build if the build is alreadydone, automatically.Mazen Faraj. ', 'SR': 'If "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspectiveis always enabled. '}
